mapper.select: select id,level_s "level",root_id rootId,father_id fatherId,dic_num dicNum,dic_name dicName,dic_key dicKey,dic_value dicValue ,list_no listNo,time_create timeCreate,time_modified timeModified,isDeleted from govmade_dic t where t.father_id IN ( SELECT id FROM govmade_dic t WHERE t.father_id IN ( SELECT id FROM govmade_dic WHERE dic_num = #{dicNum}))
SELECT count(*) FROM govmade_dic t WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert:
SELECT govmade_dic_seq.CURRVAL ID FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO govmade_dic(level_s,root_id,father_id,dic_num,dic_name,dic_key,dic_value,list_no,time_create,time_modified,isDeleted) VALUES (#{level,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{rootId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{fatherId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{dicNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dicKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dicValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{listNo,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{timeCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{timeModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{isDeleted,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update:
UPDATE govmade_dic SET isDeleted =1 WHERE id in
#{o.id}
